articles.description: Researchers find immunity remains for minimum of eight months, fuelling hope vaccines could protect population for years
articles.content:
Immunity to coronavirus lasts at least eight months and may even last for years, new research suggests. 
A study of 185 Covid survivors looked at multiple types of immune cells, including those that… [+3742 chars]
